voice_akashiSummerdive2108_h_gachaResult:
I won't let 'em mess with summer
vacation! This resort's in good hands
with me!
W-Wait, what's with this outfit?! Is
this supposed to be a swimsuit?!
voice_akashiSummerdive2108_s_gachaResult:
Need my help? Sure thing, leave the
outfield to me!
We may be at a resort, but I'll put the
effort in, don't worry!
voice_akashi_h_gachaResult:
Name's Akashi. I'm a college student and
member of the baseball club. I'm not
really cut out to be a Hero, but here I
am...
This is basically just another part-time
job. Let's get on well, yeah?
voice_akashi_s_gachaResult:
Name's Akashi. I go to college and I
play baseball. I can't up and ignore
someone I grew up with, so...
I'll do anything I can. Just ask.
voice_alchibaChasers2105_h_gachaResult:
Didn't think the day would come that I'd
hold a gun again.
All right. I'll bring it all under the
light of day, and I'll reform him.
You'll see.
voice_alchibaChasers2105_s_gachaResult:
Oh, need my help? Sure thing. Just leave
it all to me.
I'll solve your mysteries with pomp and
style!
voice_alchiba_h_gachaResult:
Name's Alchiba. I'm a humble private
eye. I'm glad to have a client as
fetching as you are.
Now, what darkness do you need me to
bring light to? What job do you have for
me?
voice_alchiba_s_gachaResult:
Alchiba. I'm a private eye. Pleased to
make your acquaintance.
Need me to be a Sidekick? Job accepted.
Any job I get, I do fully and perfectly,
you see.
voice_alpheccaThermae2307_h_gachaResult:
I am King of Aradi... No. I am but a
traveler passing by named Alphecca!
Come, let us enjoy our journey to the
fullest together!
voice_alpheccaThermae2307_s_gachaResult:
Leave it all to me! Haha, so far from
home, I'll be free of pressure and
complaint...
Ah! Ahah, nothing! I said nothing, and
you heard nothing!
voice_alphecca_h_gachaResult:
I am the nameless white knight... No. I
am the king of Aradicia, Alphecca Gemma
XXI!
On my honor as king, I vow to win you
glory on the battlefield that you would
expect of a knight of my measure.
voice_alphecca_s_gachaResult:
I am Alphecca, king of Aradicia. If it
is to help soldiers, I will gladly lend
you my aid.
It is a king's duty to protect his
subjects, after all.
voice_andrewLostAncients2208_h_gachaResu:
Master, I've added a new purpose to my
dream.
I want to protect the bond born when
biological and mechanical life meet, and
I'll dive to the bottom of this lake to
do so.
voice_andrewLostAncients2208_s_gachaResu:
Sidekick work today, huh? Sure, I'm in.
I've input the lake patrol route, so
don't worry about that. Let's get going,
master!
voice_andrew_h_gachaResult:
I am Andrew, a space transporter. Oh, I
take on Hero work, too.
I want to protect organic life forms
like you, with my own hands.
voice_andrew_s_gachaResult:
I'm Andrew, a truck driver. I'm pretty
interested in organic life forms like
you.
How about it? How about letting me work
with you?
voice_anna_h_gachaResult:
Hiya! I'm Anna, a senior at Sakuramoto
High!
I can help people with my dancing,
right? Like, what could be better?!
Looking forward to working with ya!
voice_anna_s_gachaResult:
I'm Anna, a senior at Sakuramoto High!
Nice to meetcha! Huh...? Sidekick? You
mean the people who cheer Heroes on?
Well, leave it to me! I'm really good at
cheerleading, too!
voice_astar_h_gachaResult:
So, you observed me? Hold on a moment. I
need to get ready.
Hohoho! It's me, Santa! Hm...? This
doesn't suit me? Where are you even
from?
voice_astar_s_gachaResult:
Me...? I'm Astar. Job? Santa. You the
Observer?
Very well. You're my new apprentice.
Follow me.
voice_astosis_h_gachaResult:
I am Astosis, attorney at law. I promise
not to let you down, whether in court or
on the battlefield.
I'm glad to know that we'll be working
together for a long time to come.
voice_astosis_s_gachaResult:
I am Astosis, attorney at law, and I
thank you for my assignment to Sidekick.
I hope to build a robust working
relationship.
You've given me the reason to take that
first step, after all.
voice_barrelHerofesta2109_h_gachaResult:
Lawbreakers beware, the water gunman
with blazing eyes, Officer Barrel, is
here!
Crook or not, anyone who wants to get
soaked, step right up!
voice_barrelHerofesta2109_s_gachaResult:
Summer means the beach, and the beach
means it's my time to shine! Officer
Barrel, reporting to party!
I'll soak down any crooks and criminals
with these custom water guns!
voice_barrel_h_gachaResult:
Officer Barrel of the OCPD, reporting
for duty! I got a clip full of justice
and a heart burning to see things right!
Where's the crime scene? The baddies?
Lemme at 'em!
voice_barrel_s_gachaResult:
Howdy! I'm police-box patrolman Officer
Barrel!
Leave the Sidekickery to me! I'll fill
the air with so much covering fire they
won't know what hit 'em!
voice_borealis_h_gachaResult:
I am Borealis, one who conducts.
Your sound is... very nostalgic. I would
be honored to share a stage with you.
voice_borealis_s_gachaResult:
Do you ask for a performance from me,
operator? Let me tune my drones for the
next concert, then...
Hmm? You wish me to be a Sidekick? Very
well, I'll get to that when I am
finished.
voice_bygul_h_gachaResult:
I'm Bygul, also known as Zippy C.!
When I'm swinging my fists on camera,
it's gonna be like I'm right out of a
movie! Look forward to it!
voice_bygul_s_gachaResult:
I'm Bygul! Gotta say, I didn't expect
you'd ask a rookie like me to be a
Sidekick!
I can't thank you enough! I'll work
super hard, too, so don't worry about a
thing!
voice_cerastium_h_gachaResult:
Cerastium La Forge of the UEHA France
branch. You may call me Ceras.
Let us fight together to see that
justice be done!
voice_cerastium_s_gachaResult:
My name is Cerastium La Forge. You're my
new commander, then?
My mission is to be a Sidekick, then.
Understood and accepted. Let us enact
justice together!
voice_crowne_h_gachaResult:
I'm Crowne, a mechanic. I take it you're
my operator, then?
Heh. Was probably meant to be. Hope we
get on well!
voice_crowne_s_gachaResult:
I'm Crowne, a humble mechanic. Need a
spaceship fixed or tuned up?
Or how about a... Hm? Me, a Sidekick?
That's a pick, I'll give you that.
voice_danzo_h_gachaResult:
Yo, yo, yo! You doing fine?! Doing
good?! Real-deal ninja Danzo Yahiko is
here to serve his new liege!
Let's go hand in hand to make the
galaxy's best rave, c'mon!
voice_danzo_s_gachaResult:
What up, what up, what up? What's good?!
It's your boy Danzo Yahiko, real-deal
ninja in the house!
Time to hype this battle up with a sick
beat!
voice_digram_h_gachaResult:
I am deeply grateful for our contract of
cooperation. I am Digram, and I work at
the interstellar passenger transport
system.
Let us do our best to preserve the
future of the galaxy's transportation
network.
voice_digram_s_gachaResult:
This unit's name is Digram. I work at
the interstellar passenger transport
system.
I willingly accept this assignment to
Sidekick and will put my full circuitry
to use in the task.
voice_esperdica_h_gachaResult:
I am Esperdica, owner and barista of a
humble cafe. Indeed, I have heard much
about you.
Much from who, you ask? Haha, I'm afraid
that's a secret.
voice_esperdica_s_gachaResult:
My name is Esperdica. I'm a barista by
trade. Worry not—I am prepared to serve
as a Sidekick.
Oh, and I've fixed you a cup of coffee.
I do hope you like it.
voice_exio_h_gachaResult:
Oh, goodness. You can observe me, can
you? Haha. Well, use me as you'd like.
Though "Hero" is the last thing you can
call me.
This form is undoubtedly the correct one
but...
I'm surprised you've connected to me
after all that. Would you rather me
destroy you now than later, then?
voice_exio_s_gachaResult:
I cannot say I imagined I would end up
working with you. Allow me to introduce
myself, then.
I am Exio, the Observer who holds all in
his hands.
voice_flamierGhostWoods2204_h_gachaResul:
A festival of flowers? My, how
wonderful!
Everyone is dancing and enjoying
themselves so... Hm? What about me? Oh,
certainly—let us dance together, then.
voice_flamierGhostWoods2204_s_gachaResul:
Greetings. You called?
Oh, you would like me to work as a
Sidekick? Very well. Do leave the
dancing and battling to me.
voice_flamier_h_gachaResult:
Greetings. My name is Flamier, and I
teach high school.
Special talents? Well, I tend to indulge
in the odd explosion. I do look forward
to working together, too.
voice_flamier_s_gachaResult:
Greetings. My name is Flamier, and I
teach high school. I'm pleased to be
chosen as a Sidekick.
In exchange, would you mind if I used
just a few explosives here and there?
voice_furlongCircus2202_h_gachaResult:
With blazing eyes of passion, Burn
Striker takes the stage!
I'll wow them with my blazing moves!
voice_furlongCircus2202_s_gachaResult:
H-Huh? Me? On stage?!
O-Oh, in the back, as a Sidekick.
W-Well, in that case, sure, I'll do my
best.
voice_furlong_h_gachaResult:
With eyes that blaze for justice, Burn
Striker takes to the stage!
Bring on the flames! I'll blaze 'em
away!
voice_furlong_s_gachaResult:
I-I'm Furlong. A fire fighter. B-Burn
Striker, that's me.
E-Er. I'm scared out of my wits, b-but
I'll do my best...
voice_gaius_h_gachaResult:
I'm Gaius. Diver and Hero.
So, you're my operator, then? I'll help
you out to save the lake. Just... don't
get in my way.
voice_gaius_s_gachaResult:
I'm Gaius. I work as a guide in this
lake.
You need me to be a Sidekick, right?
Sure, let's just get it done quick.
voice_gammeiRakusai2304_h_gachaResult:
I'm a UEHA Hero, Justlock.
Ah, there's a reason I'm dressed like
this, but don't worry about it. I'm not
messing around, got it?
voice_gammeiRakusai2304_s_gachaResult:
Gammei Tsukinowa, deployed on request.
Heh heh. I don't mind work trips, you
know? I can eat a bunch and ring it up
as expenses!
voice_gammei_h_gachaResult:
Name's Gammei. I'm an OCPD detective. I
work as a Hero while I crack cases.
If you happen on any hardcore criminals,
give me a call.
voice_gammei_s_gachaResult:
Inspector Gammei, OCPD. Need my
cooperation? Sure, you've got it.
Not like the precinct pays me enough,
anyway.
voice_ganran_h_gachaResult:
I'm Ganran the blacksmith! Killer
Kaibutsu or humble kitchen knife, I'll
beat 'em back into shape with this
hammer!
Sounds like I'll get forged into shape
on your crew, myself! Gahaha!
voice_ganran_s_gachaResult:
I'm Ganran, a blacksmith! What's that?
You want me to be a Sidekick?
I'd rather leave that to my blade geek
of an apprentice, but let's strike while
the iron's hot with just us!
voice_garbo_h_gachaResult:
My name is Galvo. The visage you see is
my ultimate destination, a manifestation
of my dreams made real.
Hahaha! Quite eye-catching, wouldn't you
say?
voice_garbo_s_gachaResult:
I am Galvo, a linguist. I love that
which shines before it vanishes into the
annals of history, known or unknown.
But enough stiffness and formality!
Please, call me Galvy!
voice_giansar_h_gachaResult:
So, you're my new client? Name's
Giansar. I'm what you'd call a hacker.
If you're giving an outlaw like me work,
well... who do you want hijacked?
voice_giansar_s_gachaResult:
Name's Giansar. I'm what you'd call a
hacker. Not cut out to be a Sidekick,
but a job's a job.
I'll hijack the role and become one
perfectly and completely, just like I do
everything else.
voice_gomeisaXmasMelt2212_h_gachaResult:
Merry Christmas! It's me, Gomeisa! I'm
Santa, and I've got shinies to sprinkle!
I'll protect everyone's smiles with my
new dance of peace!
voice_gomeisaXmasMelt2212_s_gachaResult:
Make way for Gomeisa Santa! Oh?
Sidekick? Of course!
Let's bring fun to every person!
voice_gomeisa_h_gachaResult:
I am Gomeisa, a dancer of peace! It is
my deep wish...
For everyone to live and dance and have
fun!
voice_gomeisa_s_gachaResult:
Oh, hello, operator! You called? If you
need dancing and smiles, I can help!
Watch for the Gomeisa Happy Dance!
voice_goroGhostWoods2204_h_gachaResult:
A festival? That means booze, dancing,
and music!
You'd be surprised at how highly people
hold my performances! Let's enjoy
ourselves till we're dead drunk!
voice_goroGhostWoods2204_s_gachaResult:
Oh, come to listen to a song?
Aww, you want me to do Sidekick stuff
instead? Sidekicking, music, basically
the same thing! Leave it to me!
voice_goro_h_gachaResult:
So, you're the new boss? Name's Goro.
I'm a carpenter, as you can see.
I can be a Hero when I've got some drink
in me. Send me where you gotta.
voice_goro_s_gachaResult:
Hey there, boss! Been drinking well?
Huh? This ain't a drinking shindig? It
was so busy I had the wrong idea!
Yeah, Goro, that's me. I'm a carpenter.
Pleased to meetcha.
voice_grigory_h_gachaResult:
Oh, you want me to be a Hero? That's
something I don't get every day. I'm
Grigory!
So, what work do you have for me?
voice_grigory_s_gachaResult:
Hey there, good to meet you! My name's
Grigory!
If you, like, need any help with streams
and stuff, I just might be able to help!
voice_hisakiLostAncients2208_h_gachaResu:
A genius inventor and man who looks
great by the water—that's me, Hisaki!
I'll show you the hottest, coolest
inventions you've ever seen! Get ready!
voice_hisakiLostAncients2208_s_gachaResu:
Whoa! I thought you were hitting on me,
but you're recruiting me to be a
Sidekick, huh?
Sure thing, client! I'll show you the
best aquatic invention you've ever seen!
voice_hisaki_h_gachaResult:
The super inventor everyone's talking
about, Hisaki, has taken the field!
Leave it to me!
I'll show you the most cutting-edge
technology in the galaxy!
voice_hisaki_s_gachaResult:
Need something from this genius
inventor? Sure, I'll help you out!
My amazing mechs have got your back!
voice_hitomiSummerdive2108_h_gachaResult:
Newly outfitted and summer-ready,
Heart-stopping Red has taken over the
beach!
Hey, partner, do you think this looks
good on me?
voice_hitomiSummerdive2108_s_gachaResult:
Hey! Delivering heart-stopping songs
straight to your ears, it's Hitomi
Ayauta!
Coming to you live from this beautiful
resort—get ready to hear my latest!
voice_hitomi_h_gachaResult:
Delivering heart-stopping songs to your
ears, it's Hitomi Ayauta! Pretty and
strong, that's me!
Let's do our best, partner!
voice_hitomi_s_gachaResult:
Delivering heart-stopping songs right to
your ears, it's Hitomi Ayauta!
Whether I'm on stage or on the
sidelines, I always do my best!
voice_huckle_h_gachaResult:
Leap of Faith, reporting for duty.
Starting now, our company will enact
justice.
Are you prepared to see this through,
rookie?
voice_huckle_s_gachaResult:
I'm Huckle, CEO of this company. You
probably knew that already, though.
I welcome new hires like you with open
arms. I promise to provide you with an
environment where you can do your best.
voice_hydoor_h_gachaResult:
Heh. You the one trying to win me over?
Get me on your team?
Y'know what, I like that. You got guts,
I'll give you that.
voice_hydoor_s_gachaResult:
Hm? The hell's with you? You really want
to put me, Hydoor, on Sidekick duty?
Tch. Fine, fine. You got guts, I'll give
you that.
voice_isaribi_h_gachaResult:
You the one who called for me? Well,
you've come to the right fisher. Leave
it all to me!
No matter how big the catch, I'll run
'em through!
voice_isaribi_s_gachaResult:
Make way for the galaxy's strongest
fisher, Isaribi!
Oh, you need me to be a Sidekick? Sure
thing. Stick with me and it'll be smooth
sailing the whole trip!
voice_kalaski_h_gachaResult:
I'm Kalaski, pro photojournalist. I'll
go to any battlefield for a price.
I'll say this now, too—don't look at me
like I'm a kid.
voice_kalaski_s_gachaResult:
I'm Kalaski, a war journalist.
I never let a chance for a good photo
escape. I'll follow your Heroes to the
ends of the Earth and aid 'em.
voice_kirsch_h_gachaResult:
I'm Kirsch, a pastry chef! I'm looking
to make the legendary pastry that
enchanted my mentor's powerful palate...
And I'm ready to keep fighting until the
day I master the recipe!
voice_kirsch_s_gachaResult:
I'm Kirsch, a girl who's put it all into
pastry-making! Leave the Hero support to
me!
On my mentor's honor, I'll put my whole
soul into the job!
voice_koukiRakusai2304_h_gachaResult:
Hi there! I'm Kouki Inukura! So, what do
you think of this special outfit?
I'm going to be really cool out there,
so I'd love it if you all cheered me on!
voice_koukiRakusai2304_s_gachaResult:
Mornin'... Huh? O-Operator, what's up
with your outfit?!
We're working in Kyoto! Don't you have
anything better to wear? Need me to pick
something out for you?
voice_kouki_h_gachaResult:
I'm Kouki Inukura, and this is Sirius!
Huh? The cameras are off? Tch. Well, try
your hardest not to weigh me down, all
right?
voice_kouki_s_gachaResult:
I'm Kouki, and this is Sirius.
You have the privilege of having a
superstar like me as a sidekick. You
better be grateful.
voice_kyoichiValentine2102_h_gachaResult:
Agent of Love ETL, reporting for duty!
I'm here to save the kids in need!
Everything you're feeling, all your
worries and anxieties, just slam them
all onto me!
voice_kyoichiValentine2102_s_gachaResult:
Agent of Love, reporting for duty! Leave
the Sidekicking to me!
When it comes to support and backup, no
one's got me beat!
voice_kyoichi_h_gachaResult:
Teacher of Wangansan Elementary Class
4-2, Kyoichi Otomo!
I'll fight any manner of foe to protect
my students and their day-to-day lives!
voice_kyoichi_s_gachaResult:
I'm Kyoichi! I teach elementary school.
Sidekick? You got it—schoolkids or
Heroes, I'll lead them with the best
support you could ask for!
voice_lilac_h_gachaResult:
I'm Lilac. I work as a florist.
This scent... Sounds like you need me to
drive off Kaibutsu. Don't worry, I'll
cut them down with these shears.
voice_lilac_s_gachaResult:
I'm Lilac. I work as a florist.
You want me as a Sidekick? Of course. I
just finished up a bouquet—pretty, isn't
it?
voice_loren_h_gachaResult:
My name's Loren. I'm a nurse.
Just leave the hurt and injured to me.
I'll do my best for them!
voice_loren_s_gachaResult:
I'm Loren, a lunar nurse.
Leave the hurt Heroes to me. I'll do my
best as a Sidekick!
voice_maculata_h_gachaResult:
My name is Maculata, darling. I'm a
fashion designer extraordinaire.
Recruiting me? You've got quite the eye
for quality, and you look rather daring
yourself.
voice_maculata_s_gachaResult:
My name is Maculata, darling. I'm a
fashion designer extraordinaire.
Sidekick? Certainly. I'll make the stage
of your battles the most flashy and
daring anyone's ever seen.
voice_marfikRuins2104_h_gachaResult:
The ever-present, immortal adventurer:
that's me, Professor Marfik!
If it's a labyrinth we're taking on, I'm
your man!
voice_marfikRuins2104_s_gachaResult:
I'm Professor Marfik, master adventurer!
Leave the party backup to me!
I'll make sure everyone's taken care of!
voice_marfik_h_gachaResult:
Here today, gone tomorrow—Professor
Marfik, an adventurer traveling the
stars, that's me!
Come, join me on a journey to sights
unseen to unravel the mysteries of
history!
voice_marfik_s_gachaResult:
Call me Professor Marfik. I explore the
beautiful wonders of days past.
If you'll help a touch in my next
excavation, I could stand to help you in
your endeavors!
voice_melide_s_gachaResult:
I'm Melide, the Kaibutsu-calling witch.
I think we can understand each other.
Whether we'll become friends, well...
that's another story.
voice_mokdaiMeteorite2112_h_gachaResult:
Merry Christmas! Eheheh!
Today's a really special day, and I'm
going to get people the presents they're
waiting for!
voice_mokdaiMeteorite2112_s_gachaResult:
I'll do my best as a Sidekick to make
sure everyone can enjoy this special
day!
Huh? W-Wait, my job's pulling the
sleigh?!
voice_mokdai_h_gachaResult:
I'm Mokdai, a camera operator! If you
need the battle stream prettied up,
leave it to me!
Huh?! Y-You're making me fight?!
voice_mokdai_s_gachaResult:
I'm Mokdai! I guess I'm your senior on
the team, huh? Well, if you want to talk
about films or Heroes, I'm your man!
I'm a pro in this field, you know?
Eheheh!
voice_monomasaWorkout2312_h_gachaResult:
Hm. This is both yours and the Parallel
Cue's power... Not bad. Never thought I
would be Santa.
Well, let's be off. Are you ready to fly
through the night with us?
voice_monomasaWorkout2312_s_gachaResult:
It kind of baffles me a little. To have
something, to hold it in one's grasp,
but not to notice...
Is this what you call happiness? What do
you think?
voice_monomasa_h_gachaResult:
I'm Dolovain, the one borrowing this
body.
If it will help Monomasa awaken, I will
lend you this loathsome Kaibutsu power
of mine.
voice_monomasa_s_gachaResult:
Call me... Monomasa Osato.
That's the name of this body's owner. I
just live in it, so we should go by it.
voice_narihitoMeteorite2112_h_gachaResul:
Great Memorious, here to save Christmas!
I'll protect this city, just like the
superhero I looked up to as a kid!
voice_narihitoMeteorite2112_s_gachaResul:
Need my assistance, operator?
Well, leave it to me! When it comes to
Heroes, I've got more knowledge and info
than anyone, anywhere!
voice_narihito_h_gachaResult:
Narihito Karue with Taiyo News! You
there, Hero and Operator!
Please, I would just love to have an
interview!
voice_narihito_s_gachaResult:
My name's Narihito Karue. I'm a reporter
for Taiyo News!
Work as a Sidekick? Certainly, if you
promise me exclusive interviews after
battles!
voice_nessenMasquerade2310_h_gachaResult:
Commander, please take my hand.
Allow me to escort you to the ball,
where we shall be the stars of the
floor.
voice_nessenMasquerade2310_s_gachaResult:
You would like me to be a Sidekick? Very
well, I shall.
Though this is, unfortunately, not a hot
spring, I shall support you with the
best hospitality I can.
voice_nessen_h_gachaResult:
My name is Nessen, and I manage a hot
springs hotel.
My heart burns with the desire to bring
peace and rest to those who seek it, and
for them I fight.
voice_nessen_s_gachaResult:
My name is Nessen. I manage a hot
springs hotel.
I shall do my utmost as a Sidekick.
Please, allow me to support you as best
I can.
voice_obsidiusCrisis2404_h_gachaResult:
Bring it on, all of you! You think you
can just waltz in here and solve my
mysteries? Think again!
Let's get going! I'm gonna make this
Gatling gun go wild!
voice_obsidiusCrisis2404_s_gachaResult:
I'm Obsidius, a mineralogist! Nowadays,
I'm in the resistance's vanguard!
My new position is Sidekick? Got it!
voice_obsidius_h_gachaResult:
The name's Obsidius, and I'm here to
break through the unknown with this
drill!
Leave the breaking to me!
voice_obsidius_s_gachaResult:
I'm Obsidius, a mineralogist. If you've
got any rare-looking minerals, I would
be more than happy to... Oh!
You want me to work as a Sidekick first,
right? Well, you've got it!
voice_okitakaCrisis2404_h_gachaResult:
Sorry for the wait, rookie! Name's
Okitaka, and I've got a real history
fighting on the front lines!
Let's break outta this prison together!
I'll blow a hole through their lines!
voice_okitakaCrisis2404_s_gachaResult:
I'm Okitaka Takadono of the UEHA, and
I'm back with a new outfit!
Think of it like a return to form,
y'know? And let me tell you, I've still
got it!
voice_okitaka_h_gachaResult:
I'm the commander of UEHA's Japan
branch, Okitaka Takadono! Let's get
going, rookie!
I'll put you through the wringer—teach
you some unbeatable strategies!
voice_okitaka_s_gachaResult:
I'm the commander of UEHA's Japan
branch, Okitaka Takadono! You're in good
hands with me!
Really, this old man's a lot better
sidekicking than on the front lines.
voice_phein_h_gachaResult:
I'm Phein, a mercenary. So, you're my
client? Well... stay away from the front
lines, no matter what.
I'll protect the weak, even if it costs
me everything. That's my job. That's my
duty.
voice_phein_s_gachaResult:
I'm Phein, a mercenary. You paid me to
do a job, and I'm going to do it.
Keep your distance from me, though. I
don't want you getting hurt.
voice_polarisWorkout2312_h_gachaResult:
The brightest star, shining on Christmas
Eve: Polariiiiis Mask!
I've come to bring you all a beautiful
night, and... Hm? Partner, there's
something on this outfit I didn't
order...
voice_polarisWorkout2312_s_gachaResult:
All right, game faces on! Time for some
entertainment! I'm not letting any of
you suffer a lonely night tonight!
I'm Polaris Mask, your brightest shining
star!
voice_polaris_h_gachaResult:
The star shining brightest in the
northern sky, the man who crushes evil
and leads the weak! That's me,
Polariiiiiis Mask!
Take me to the best ring you got,
partner!
voice_polaris_s_gachaResult:
I'm the star shining brightest in the
ring, Polariiiiiis Mask! Need me to be
your second, partner?
Sure thing, you've got it! We'll put on
a show that'll have the crowd howling!
voice_procyChocolatefes2303_h_gachaResul:
I'm the biggest, baddest boss around!
For those who depend on me... I'll use
these fists to do what's right!
If you need 'em, I'll swing 'em around
for a bargain price!
voice_procyChocolatefes2303_s_gachaResul:
Need me to be a Sidekick? Well, you've
been a real good customer, so consider
it a special service!
Time to get my fists into somethin'...!
voice_procy_h_gachaResult:
Didn't think I'd get scouted in my own
damn bar.
Well, leave the money-making to me.
Hell, I'll even give you a business
lecture at a real special price.
voice_procy_s_gachaResult:
You got a lotta guts putting me in the
Sidekick seat, but you know what? Sure,
as long as I get paid.
No need to shake like that—I'm not going
to break the bank. I'll give you a
discount.
voice_pubraseer_h_gachaResult:
I am Pubraseer, spaceship captain. The
memories have finally come back to me.
Hm? I speak differently now? Don't you
worry. These are both the real me.
voice_pubraseer_s_gachaResult:
I'm Pubraseer, cruise ship cleaning
staff!
I seem to have lost my memories in a
pretty big way, so let me know if I say
anything that sounds off!
voice_raizi_s_gachaResult:
The name's Raizi. Are you the one
twisted enough to want a gambler like me
as a Sidekick?
Heh. I'll take that bet. Just don't
disappoint me.
voice_raktaThermae2307_h_gachaResult:
The water, the trees, the beauty of the
city... All bolster the heart, becoming
the medicine the ailing need to stand
again.
Let us be off, then! It is time for
treatment!
voice_raktaThermae2307_s_gachaResult:
I am glad to see you again, client. I
swear on my scalpel to preserve public
health!
Now, let us start with a round of house
visits! Come! The patients await us!
voice_rakta_h_gachaResult:
My name is Rakta. I'm a doctor. Come,
let's get right to work.
We must excise the cancerous cells that
threaten this world!
voice_rakta_s_gachaResult:
I am Rakta, a lunar surgeon. Allow me to
be your sidekick.
I will do my utmost to excise the world
of what ails it!
voice_rexerVolcano2402_h_gachaResult:
I am reX... Er... No, I'm Alex the
hunter!
With gear like this, I can keep cool
even in the middle of a volcano! Time
for hunting! You're gonna see my skills!
voice_rexerVolcano2402_s_gachaResult:
I'm Alex, son of digital Hero reXer! You
need me to be a Sidekick, right?
Well, you got it! Every quest you've
got, I'll do my best to help out!
voice_rexer_h_gachaResult:
I'm reXer, a pro gamer and digital Hero.
We're winning the next game—together.
E-Er... so look forward to it, okay?
Eheh.
voice_rexer_s_gachaResult:
I'm reXer, a pro gamer and digital Hero.
I'll do my best as a Sidekick, too.
Because, well... a pro doesn't choose
his work.
voice_roiker_h_gachaResult:
I'm Roiker. I study celestial bodies.
This galaxy is in danger... Would you
stand against what threatens it by my
side?
voice_roiker_s_gachaResult:
I'm Roiker. I study celestial bodies. If
it's what you want, I'll gladly help
you.
Because, well... you may prove to be a
dear ally by my side in days to come.
voice_rutilix_h_gachaResult:
I am Rutilix, knight of Aradicia! I am
here to serve as your blade!
On my honor as a knight, I will see your
life protected and your foes felled!
voice_rutilix_s_gachaResult:
I am Rutilix, knight of Aradicia! Worry
not, master mage!
On my honor, I vow to see your soldiers
well supported!
voice_ryekieXmas2012_h_gachaResult:
The year is over, but my career is back!
S-ranked Hero Bolt of Justice is back,
baby!
Yeahhhh! Yeesh, dunno why, but today I
just feel on tooop o' the world!
voice_ryekieXmas2012_s_gachaResult:
Oh, you called?! Well, I'll always help
the next office generation! Leave it to
me!
Sidekicking, battles, banquets, I'll
hype it all up! Let's go!
voice_ryekie_h_gachaResult:
My name is Ryekie, but you can call me
Bolt of Justice!
Meet the man, the myth, the legend, Bolt
of Justice!
voice_ryekie_s_gachaResult:
Make way for Bolt of Justice! What's
that? You want me on Sidekick duty? You
got it!
Hero or Sidekick, I'm making sure
justice is done!
voice_ryusei_h_gachaResult:
Hey there! I'm Ryusei, a Hero belonging

I fight with this toned physique and

voice_ryusei_s_gachaResult:
I'm Ryusei, a fitness model! Good to

it if you called on me during my off hours.
For the Sidekick stuff, of course! Leave
the support to these muscles!
voice_sadayoshiSurvival2309_h_gachaResul:
Colonel Sadayoshi Ikusabata, reporting
for my next mission: vacation. Chief, I
am fully prepared.
Requesting instruction on the proper way
to spend one's time off!
voice_sadayoshiSurvival2309_s_gachaResul:
Colonel Sadayoshi Ikusabata, reporting

spend my time off.
I need to loosen up first? Relax my
shoulders? V-Very well, I shall do my
best!
voice_sadayoshi_h_gachaResult:
I am Colonel Sadayoshi Ikusabata of the
JDB. I am now under your command.
I do hope that we can work together to
protect peace.
voice_sadayoshi_s_gachaResult:
I am Colonel Sadayoshi Ikusabata of the
JDB. I shall serve under you as a
Sidekick.
Let us endeavor with our Heroes to
maintain peace.
voice_santetsu_h_gachaResult:
I'm Santetsu, a librarian.
Need me to do some Hero work? Well,

voice_santetsu_s_gachaResult:
I'm Santetsu, a librarian. Hm? Sidekick?
That... that sounds like a pain.
Ah, nothing. I'll do my job, don't
worry.
voice_seiichiro_s_gachaResult:
I'm the Vice-Minister of the JDB,
Seiichiro Tenma.
Your safety, your growth as an
operator—leave it all to me. I'll take
care of you.
voice_sensettia_h_gachaResult:
I'm Sensettia! So, you're my operator,
huh? Sure, I'll help you with my
singing.
Leave it to me! I'm not holding anything
back!
voice_sensettia_s_gachaResult:
I'm Sensettia, a singer and songwriter!
Huh? Sidekick?
Fine, fine, I'll do it. You're listening
to at least one song first, though. Go
on, sit down!
voice_shaftVirtualFesta2210_h_gachaResul:
Even if we're in the digital sea and I

you up with these legs of mine.
I'll make sure you get to your
destination, too! If there's anything
I'm confident in, it's my lower body
strength!
voice_shaftVirtualFesta2210_s_gachaResul:
You've selected me to be a Sidekick?
Very well. Let's be off, then.
Don't worry. I may not have my
navigator, but I won't get lost.
voice_shaft_h_gachaResult:
My name's Shaft. I drive a space taxi.
I'll take care of your navigational

voice_shaft_s_gachaResult:
I'm Shaft, a taxi driver. Er, you...

I don't think I'll get us lost. At

voice_shidemasu_h_gachaResult:
Shidemasu Hanemaru, Hero Insurance Sales

Our clients' safety comes first. I will

voice_shidemasu_s_gachaResult:
Shidemasu Hanemaru. I'm with Jupiter
Insurance.

I will ensure your safety.
voice_shoenValentine2102_h_gachaResult:
We must reclaim our peaceful everyday.

With my body as a shield, I shall wield

voice_shoenValentine2102_s_gachaResult:
If there are hearts my brush can save,

We must reclaim our peaceful days with

voice_shoen_h_gachaResult:
I am Shoen, one who gives letters life

Nothing more and nothing less.
voice_shoen_s_gachaResult:
My name is Shoen. I'm a humble

Then I shall do all that I can to aid

voice_subaru_h_gachaResult:
I'm Subaru Nobeyama. A novelist, more or

I'm more built for quietly writing away,

voice_subaru_s_gachaResult:
My name is Subaru Nobeyama. I'm a

I want to focus on my writing, so could
you keep it to occasionally?
voice_suhailChocolatefes2303_h_gachaResu:
I heard your voice loud and clear, ally
of mine! Heh, looks like you're up to
some fun business!
No matter where you are in the galaxy,
I'll answer your call!
voice_suhailChocolatefes2303_s_gachaResu:
Sidekick? What? You mean cheer the

Gahaha! Your eyes, they're serious! I'll

interesting enough to make me nod, then!
voice_suhail_h_gachaResult:
You got a lot of guts, trying to get a

Anything you need, you come to Captain

voice_suhail_s_gachaResult:
Me, great galactic pirate captain

Hah! Fascinating choice, bold choice! I

voice_sui_h_gachaResult:
I'm Sui, an apprentice designer.
I won't say no to helping people with my

voice_sui_s_gachaResult:
Just call me Sui. I'm an apprentice

We probably won't work together long,

voice_tabit_h_gachaResult:
Tabit, former special forces captain. I

Make use of Tabit's power. As you see

voice_tabit_s_gachaResult:
Former special forces captain, Tabit.
Sidekick request received. Pick,
grateful.
Leader. Tabit. Orders.
voice_theoreol_h_gachaResult:
Ah, pleased to make your acquaintance. I

No need to be on guard—I am not someone

voice_theoreol_s_gachaResult:
You would call upon this failed

Now then, what form of alchemy would you
seek from Theoreol?
voice_toshuVirtualFesta2210_h_gachaResul:
I have seen the truth of the sword
amongst the rough waves of the digital
sea.
With the techniques I have acquired in
this world, I shall find the path to
true samuraidom! Let us be off!
voice_toshuVirtualFesta2210_s_gachaResul:
You desire my aid? Very well.
I am not yet used to moving in this

voice_toshu_h_gachaResult:
My name is Toshu. Following the path

voice_toshu_s_gachaResult:

voice_tsuneaki_h_gachaResult:
Hello there. My name's Tsuneaki Toshuku.

Huh? H-Hey, I'm not some suspicious

voice_tsuneaki_s_gachaResult:
Oh? Are you one of my fans? Ahaha, just

Let's have ourselves a long, fun working

voice_victomHerofesta2109_h_gachaResult:
Captain Rescue, on site. Allow me to
rescue the drowning.
I may not look it, but I'm quite good at
swimming.
voice_victomHerofesta2109_s_gachaResult:
Captain Rescue, on site. I'm not too fond of summer, but duty is duty.
I will aid in your beach patrols.
voice_victom_h_gachaResult:
I'm Victom, the leader of Hyper Rescue.
I will take your lives into my hands.
I, Captain Rescue himself, will see each

voice_victom_s_gachaResult:
The name is Victom. I'm captain of Hyper

Leave your Heroes' lives in my hands. I

voice_viscunam_h_gachaResult:
I am Viscunam, a scientist whose name

Leave it to me! I will show you perfect

voice_viscunam_s_gachaResult:
I am Viscunam, an inventor both

Careful, now. You won't be able to live

voice_vulpecula_h_gachaResult:
Dashing thief Vulpecula, at your

Your delicate heart lies beyond the
quiet darkness, and I shall steal it

voice_vulpecula_s_gachaResult:
A beautiful desire, like the shadow of a

You're quite the strange one, I must

voice_yasuhiko_h_gachaResult:
I'm Yasuhiko, ringmaster of Circus
Yatomi. Sit back as I lead you into a

Just kidding! Looking forward to working
with you!
voice_yasuhiko_s_gachaResult:
I'm Yasuhiko, ringmaster of Circus
Yatomi.
You're in good hands with me! Leading a
team to entertain an audience is my
specialty!
voice_yohack_h_gachaResult:
I'm Yohack, a locksmith! Great to meet

I may not look it, but I'm really good
with delicate work! Eheh!
voice_yohack_s_gachaResult:
Hey, I'm Yohack, a locksmith! Need me to

Sure, I'd be glad to! If it's something
I can be useful in, I'd love to help!
voice_yoshioriTrain2305_h_gachaResult:
Didn't think I'd see my dream come true.
Not with this fading body of mine.
Leave your safety to me. I won't let
them lay a single finger on you.
voice_yoshioriTrain2305_s_gachaResult:
A Sidekick gig, huh? Fine. C'mon, let's
get going.
Never leaving the target's side for a
second is part of my new duty.
voice_yoshiori_h_gachaResult:
Name's Yoshiori. Former soldier, current
bodyguard.
If you're hiring me, I take it you want
a hole blown through someone?
voice_yoshiori_s_gachaResult:
Name's Yoshiori. Former soldier, current
bodyguard. If you can see me, I guess
you're one of us.
You know... I like that. I'll take your
job.
voice_yuhang_h_gachaResult:
Heyyyy! I'm Yuhang, of the Gourmet
Fighters! You just need me to slice up
stuff with my cleaver, right?
Well, if you need stuff cleaved, I'm
your cook. I'll make whatever you point
me to into a real good dish.
voice_yuhang_s_gachaResult:
Ohhh, heyyyy, hello! I'm Yuhang, a cook!
Huh? Sidekick? Ahhh, yeahhh, right, I
guess I'll get around to it...
Anyway, how about a quick meal? I bet
you're hungry, right?
voice_zaniah_h_gachaResult:
Ohohoho! Requesting the aid of the great
Zania, are you? Seems you've got an eye
for quality!
All right! You and me, we're going to
strike it rich, we're going to make it
big!
voice_zaniah_s_gachaResult:
I'm Master Thief Zania, and there's
nothing I can't steal! Heh, I wouldn't
mind having you owe me one—and I mean a

Now then, let's make some money! And by
"let's," I mean mostly me!
